name: Pinch Time
summary: One of your parents has a human life span and another an elven life span, with your own somewhere between.
description:
One of your parents has a human life span and another an elven life span, with your own somewhere between. As a result, you have an unusual perspective on time, which you've learned to manifest to aid yourself in moments of stress. You gain haste as a 3rd-level arcane innate spell, though you can target only yourself. You can Cast this Spell once per day.Traits

Half-Elf: A creature with this trait is part human and part elf. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by half-elves.
